title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.46 - Fire extinguishers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.46 - Fire extinguishers

State Regulations

Each tank vehicle and refueling service vehicle shall
be equipped with at least two 20-pound dry chemical extinguishers. The
extinguishers shall be located in an accessible place as far away as
practicable from the pumping equipment. Extinguishers shall be protected by
readily removable weatherproof hoods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.46

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
